A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: At first I loved this film. It was the newest Star Wars and I was so excited that a new movie in the came out. At first I loved the one liners but then realized there was way too many and they weren't funny. I hated Luke's storyline from the first time I saw it. I hated the B plot where Finn and Rose went to the casino planet\, but I still was able to overlook it because it's Star Wars. \n\nAs time passed\, my opinion has changed drastically. I was truly heartbroken over this movie. Great visuals is the best thing I can say. I have been a life long SW fan. I actually love the prequels. I thought everyone overreacted over those films. This is different. The fans are right. TLJ has ruined Star Wars for me.
